title: BACON & CHEDDAR POTATO CUPS
directions: 1. In a large bowl, combine mashed potatoes, bacon, chives, Parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
2. Spray a 12-cup muffin pan with cooking spray and divide the mashed potatoes evenly into each cup,
3. Make a hole in the center of each mashed potato cup.
4. Add shredded cheddar to the center of each cup.
5. Bake mashed potato cups at 400ºF/200ºC for 30-35 minutes or until outside is crispy and brown.
6. Top with a dollop of sour cream, chives, and bacon crumbs. Enjoy! Source: BuzzFeed Tasty
Thank you for sharing my posts with your friends &
ingredients: ¼ cup bacon, cooked and crumbled
